plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and roots, and I need water and sun to grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I start as a seed.
💧 I drink water from the ground.
🌞 I need sunlight to live.

plant.question: I am a tree that makes a sweet treat in the fall. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I grow something round and often red.
🌳 I am a type of tree.
🥧 You can make a dessert with what I grow.

plant.question: I'm tall and green, with needles instead of leaves. People decorate me for Christmas. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I stay green all year long.
🎁 People put presents under me.
⭐ I have a pointy top.

plant.question: I have a big yellow head that follows the sun throughout the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I am a flower.
☀️ I like to face the direction of the sun.
😎 I have seeds you can eat.

plant.question: I am a vegetable that rabbits love to eat. I am long and orange. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
🐇 Bugs Bunny loves me.
👓 Some say I help you see in the dark.

plant.question: I am a vine that produces a sour fruit. People use me to make juice and jelly. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in bunches.
🍹 My juice is purple or green.
🍞 I am often eaten as a spread.

plant.question: I am a plant that can live for a very long time, and my rings can tell you my age. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I am very tall and strong.
👵 I can be hundreds of years old.
⭕ You can count my rings to see how old I am.

plant.question: I am a plant that grows in the desert and has sharp needles. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I can store water inside of me.
🏜️ I live in a very dry place.
🩹 Touching me is not fun.

plant.question: I am a green plant that has a strong smell and is used to flavor food. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I am often used in cooking.
👃 I have a distinct scent.
🍝 I can be added to pasta sauce.

plant.question: I am a carnivorous plant that traps insects to get nutrients. What am I?

hints.text: 🪰 I eat bugs.
👅 I lure in my prey.
🪴 I grow in nutrient poor soil.

transport.question: I have wheels and carry people, but I’m not a car. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 I need you to push pedals to move.
🛣️ I’m often ridden on paths made just for me.
👧👦 Kids often learn to ride me when they are young.

transport.question: I travel on rails and carry many passengers. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I make a 'choo-choo' sound.
🗺️ I can travel across countries.
💺 You sit down while I take you to your destination.

transport.question: I fly high in the sky and carry people to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I have wings, but I am not a bird.
☁️ You can see clouds from my window.
🌎 I can take you to a different country.

transport.question: I float on water and carry people or goods across the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need water to move.
⚓ I often have an anchor.
🚢 I can be very big!

transport.question: I have four wheels and carry goods. I am bigger than a car. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I often transport large boxes or items.
🚚 I am often used by companies to transport items from one place to another.
🚦 I follow the same road rules as a car.

transport.question: I can fly straight up and down, and I have a spinning blade on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I am smaller and more agile than an airplane.
🚨 I'm used for rescues or transport in emergencies.
👨‍✈️ I require a special place to take off and land. A helipad.

transport.question: I take people around a city and stop frequently to pick up and drop off. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I am larger than a car and carry many people.
🛑 I have a set route and schedule.
🪙 You usually pay a fare to ride me.

transport.question: I travel underground in a city and carry many passengers quickly. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 I use electric power.
🚦 I don't get stuck in traffic.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 I am a fast way to get around a busy city.

transport.question: I'm a two-wheeled vehicle that's faster than a bicycle and requires a license to drive. What am I?

hints.text: 🏍️ I have an engine that makes a 'vroom' sound.
⛑️ Safety equipment is very important when riding me.
🛣️ I can be used on normal roads.

transport.question: I am a vehicle that explores space, carrying astronauts to the moon and beyond. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I need powerful engines to escape Earth's gravity.
👩‍🚀 I allow people to explore things nobody has ever seen.
🌑 I can travel to planets.
